========================
virtualenvwrapper.tmpenv
========================

``virtualenvwrapper.tmpenv`` is a plugin for virtualenvwrapper_ for
working with temporary virtual environments. After it is installed,
the ``mktmpenv`` command can be used to create a temporary virtualenv,
which is deleted automatically when it is deactivated.

Refer to the `main documentation page
<http://www.doughellmann.com/docs/virtualenvwrapper.tmpenv/>`__ for
installation and setup details.
